commit.message:
Rollup merge of #97264 - TaKO8Ki:suggest-extern-crate-when-failing-to-resolve-use-crate, r=estebank

Suggest `extern crate foo` when failing to resolve `use foo`

closes #97095

r? ``@estebank``

verification.payload:

parent 7d4cf710e2678d31fd899c452e1d4baf48eb8a86
parent b2480a0251465ddda9a45fc375197c6fbad4f764
author Matthias Krüger <matthias.krueger@famsik.de> 1654096265 +0200
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1654096265 +0200

Rollup merge of #97264 - TaKO8Ki:suggest-extern-crate-when-failing-to-resolve-use-crate, r=estebank

Suggest `extern crate foo` when failing to resolve `use foo`

closes #97095

r? ``@estebank``
